sentences.en: A hospital administrator has resigned over claims he lied to get the job.
sentences.cn: 一位医院主管因为有人声称他的职位是骗来的而辞职了。

sentences.en: At sixteen, I resigned myself to the fact that I’d never be a dancer.
sentences.cn: 16岁的时候，我不得不接受这个事实——我永远也成不了舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: His sense of decency forced him to resign.
sentences.cn: 他顾及颜面，不得不辞了职。

sentences.en: His vice president also had to resign in disgrace.
sentences.cn: 他的副总统也被迫不光彩地辞去职务。

sentences.en: I can resign my immortal part to him without misgiving.
sentences.cn: 我可以毫无恐惧地把我不朽的部分交给他.

sentences.en: I had better resign myself to Destiny.
sentences.cn: 我最好还是向命运投降.

sentences.en: I resign my children to your care.
sentences.cn: 我把孩子们委托你来照顾.

sentences.en: I shall never ask, never refuse, nor ever resign an office.
sentences.cn: 我将永不营求, 永不拒绝, 也永不辞去职务.

sentences.en: I will resign myself to your guidance.
sentences.cn: (我愿意听从你的指导)请多多指教.

sentences.en: It was better to submit, to resign oneself to the inevitable.
sentences.cn: 还是屈服, 听任不可避免的命运来摆布的好.

sentences.en: Josh resigned himself to the long walk home.
sentences.cn: 乔希只好走很长的路回家。

sentences.en: She resigned from the government last week.
sentences.cn: 上星期她辞去了政府部门的工作。

sentences.en: There were rumors that he would resign as Speaker after 1982.
sentences.cn: 谣传他将在一九八二年后辞去议长的职务.

sentences.en: They are intending to resign from the committee.
sentences.cn: 他们打算辞去委员会中的职务.

sentences.en: They put it about that he will resign from the cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他们到处放风说,他要退出内阁.

sentences.en: They refused to resign themselves to defeat.
We must resign ourselves to waiting a bit longer.
sentences.cn: 我们只好耐心多等一会儿.

sentences.en: Why do you want to resign your position as secretary?
sentences.cn: 你为什么想辞去秘书的职务?

sentences.en: You must resign yourselves to waiting a bit longer.
sentences.cn: 你们要耐心多等一会儿.

words.tran_cn: 顺从的；已辞职的；己放弃的

trans.tran_cn: 辞职，放弃，屈从，勉强接受
trans.tran_en: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization

trans.tran_cn: 辞去， 放弃； 使听从， 使顺从
trans.tran_en: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
